titleStmt.title: Version Log for Version Log for Lectio 11
titleStmt.author: Jeffrey C. Witt

availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It includes an apparatus constructed from the Vatican and Reims manuscript witnesses. It awaits corrections and additions after descriptive transcriptions of the other manuscript witnesses are complete. Image coordinates also need to be embedded within the the descriptive transcription files when they are created.
